title: Remake = loss in promotion
body:
Hello,
Today happened to me that the enemy team did a  remake, because I did not want to wait for the next match, so I turned the game off and after a few hours later i turned the game on. Then I look at the league, and there I got in promotions 1 win and 1 defeat (before the remake, I had only one win).

I wrote on a eune forum already, but the community told me to write here.


https://i.nahraj.to/f/1vln.png      ( Picture of the match.... I played as Braum..... Morgana was afk )

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and was able to confirm that no LP was lost!  What you're seeing is a visual issue.  The game was remade, but the match history page has to show something, so it's currently doing a loss or win even though it doesn't actually mean anything.  Also in general, I recommend sticking to the match history in client or on our[ match history page](http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#page/landing-page).  Third party sites aren't always up to date or entirely accurate since we don't support them.  Everything look okay!
Yeah, i didnt lost LP but i got 1 loss in promotion...
